Motivation.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivation.author: Sam Levenson

Motivation.quote: Your only limit is your mind.
Motivation.author: Unknown

Motivation.quote: Success is not for the chosen few but for the few who choose it.
Motivation.author: Seth Godin

Motivation.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Motivation.author: Charles Kingsleigh (character in Alice in Wonderland)

Motivation.quote: Every morning brings new potential, but only if you make the most of it.
Motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

Motivation.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Wisdom.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Wisdom.author: Socrates

Wisdom.quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
Wisdom.author: William James

Wisdom.quote: True wisdom lies in gathering the precious things out of each day as it goes by.
Wisdom.author: E. S. Bouton

Wisdom.quote: The wise man does at once what the fool does finally.
Wisdom.author: Baltasar Graci√°n

Family.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
Family.author: Michael J. Fox

Family.quote: Family is where life begins and love never ends.
Family.author: Unknown

Family.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
Family.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Family.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
Family.author: George Bernard Shaw

Family.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
Family.author: David Ogden Stiers

Happiness.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
Happiness.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
Happiness.author: William Saroyan

Happiness.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Happiness.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness.quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
Happiness.author: Sydney J. Harris

Happiness.quote: Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy.
Happiness.author: Ralph Marston

Pets.quote: The greatness of a nation can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
Pets.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Pets.quote: The more I learn about people, the more I like my dog.
Pets.author: Mark Twain

Pets.quote: A house is not a home without a pet.
Pets.author: Unknown

Pets.quote: Pets leave paw prints on your heart.
Pets.author: Unknown

Pets.quote: The best therapist has fur and four legs.
Pets.author: Unknown
